Reviews.Title: Happy Granddaughter
Reviews.Author: Teri Neumann
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for our granddaughter for Christmas.  She is loving it.  And if she takes it to a pool party or the beach we don't have to worry about.

Reviews.Title: Great quality
Reviews.Author: TaraBella
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for my 5 year old who loves to take pics.  It takes a beating and is still working great.  It takes awesome photos during the day and at night.  We haven't hat a chance to test it out to see how waterproof it is yet but just give my son time!  Our only complaint is that it is not the best for action photos.  All in all a good first camera.
